incidents.name: Increased Error Rate Across Multiple Twilio Products

incident_updates.body: We are investigating increased error rates across multiple Twilio products. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

We've become aware of a potential issue with elevated 5xx to istio downstreams. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Our Engineers Are Investigating an Issue With Taskrouter

incident_updates.body: We have fully investigated the 503s from TaskRouter issue triggered by our automated alert, and it was determined that there is no noticeable customer impact. All systems are operational.
Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue with 503s from TaskRouter. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.

incidents.name: Programmable Voice - 11200 HTTP Retrieval Failures

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing issues with Programmable Voice, however, since there are several Twilio impacted services, we're resolving this post and we're consolidating all impacted products and services into one post. You can check the status of this at https://status.twilio.com/incidents/5mbfvb8mzhcn

Our engineers have identified the issue with Programmable Voice - 11200 HTTP Retrieval Failures. Our Engineering team is seeing recovery and are monitoring systems. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers have identified the issue with Programmable Voice - 11200 HTTP Retrieval Failures and are working to deploy a fix. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Email Channel of Twilio Verify Affected

incident_updates.body: Twilio Verify was degraded for 15 minutes between 15:41 and 15:56 Pacific Time on 03/27/2025. During this period, customers may have experienced increased latencies and 5xx errors when creating verifications with the Email channel of Twilio Verify. The issue has now been resolved.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Verify Email Channel. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Subset of Customers Experiencing Errors in Twilio CLI Deployment

incident_updates.body: The issue towards Twilio CLI deployment for a subset of customers has now been resolved.

The latest Twilio CLI deployment is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. Previously impacted customers may need to reinstall Twilio CLI using the latest version via Homebrew or npm. We'll provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
